name: GetAnimationName
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3b and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Get the animation library/name for the index.

params_body.name: index
params_body.description: The animation index, returned by GetPlayerAnimationIndex.

params_body.name: animlib[]
params_body.description: String variable that stores the animation library.

params_body.name: len1
params_body.description: Size of the string that stores the animation library.

params_body.name: animname[]
params_body.description: String variable that stores the animation name.

params_body.name: len2
params_body.description: Size of the string that stores the animation name.

related_fn: GetPlayerAnimationIndex: Returns the index of any running applied animations
